items.summary: Create a single shared "selected trading pair" state for the Dashboard tabs so that changing the symbol in any one of these places updates the others automatically: (1) the selected opportunity in the Opportunity Recognition (Oportunidades) tab, (2) the Market tab (including Market Turn Monitor), and (3) the Checklist tab (3m checklist).

Update OpportunityRecognitionPanel to expose a symbol-selection callback so that selecting an opportunity symbol triggers the shared Dashboard symbol update (without requiring the user to manually re-select the symbol in other tabs).
